name: @club-employes/utopia
description: Design system for Club Employes applications

scripts.dev: npm run build:once && npm run dev:watch
scripts.build:once: npm run build:tokens && npm run generate:icons && npm run copy:all
scripts.dev:build: npm run build:tokens && npm run generate:icons && vite build && cp src/index.d.ts dist/index.d.ts && npm run copy:tokens && npm run copy:icons
scripts.watch:tokens: chokidar "src/tokens/core/**/*" "src/tokens/themes/**/*" -c "echo 'ðŸŽ¨ Rebuilding tokens...' && npm run build:tokens:quiet && npm run copy:tokens && echo 'âœ… Tokens updated'"
scripts.watch:icons: chokidar "src/assets/icons/**/*" "scripts/process-icons.js" --ignore "**/icons-processed/**" --ignore "**/icons-list.json" -c "echo 'ðŸ”„ Processing icons...' && npm run generate:icons:quiet && npm run copy:icons && echo 'âœ… Icons updated'"
scripts.build: npm run build:tokens && npm run generate:icons && vite build && npm run copy:all
scripts.copy:all: cp src/index.d.ts dist/index.d.ts && npm run copy:tokens && npm run copy:icons && npm run copy:styles
